name: Adarsh Charitable Trust

address: X/584 B Opp.Agasthya Ashram, Puthiya Road

briefDescription: Adarsh is a registered Charitable Trust established in 1998. The main objective of the Trust is to rehabilitate persons with disabilities. The Trust started a special school in 1998 under the same name with 7 children affected mainly by Cerebral Palsy. Another section for Autism was started in 2003. Similarly 2 more sections were started in 2008 for children with Learning disorders and Down syndrome. Apart from the Rehabilitation Centre, the Trust also does various community based activities in different parts of Kerala. This includes primarily setting up schools like Adarsh, Risk Baby Unit to identify potential disabilities in Newborn babies, Newborn Hearing Screening Unit to detect the hearing acuity, a Home Based Rehabilitation unit for those children who cannot attend even a special school etc. Overall the Trust does the rehabilitation of over 700 children at any time
